'''''Chenyu's Measure''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Chenyu's Splendor]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must unlock all [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the following areas: [[Chenyu Vale: Upper Vale]], [[Chenyu Vale: Southern Mountain]] and [[Mt. Laixin]].

One of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] can only be unlocked after completing {{Quest|Scrolls and Sword Manuals of Guhua}}.
